name: The Dex
description:
In 1982 There has been a mysterious disappearance of people in the woods in sub-district of Mazel City in Eria that also has a mystery. There are many more in the woods that has not  been discovered yet

     When the news of the disappearance of people started well-known around the world, therefore, has many people wondered how people disappeared. Everyone needs to know the answer to this question.

     The fictional mystery detective named "Dex" attempts to investigate the truth. He goes to the crime scene and was fallen down into the hole to the ancient tombs while investigating. Dex must try to escape from the ancient tombs, find mysterious lost people and solve this mystery. 

How to play

A-D or W-S is the movement of the character (left right front back)
